channel.title: How to make a RSPS for Dummies
channel.description:
[center]Hello everyone, Eballer48 to answer the age old question that every nub out there wants to know. [i]HOW DO I MAKE A RUNESCAPE PRIVATE SERVER!?[/i] Well thats an easy question.. There are several tuts out there all over the internet and most of them are complicated and out dated, my goal here is to help those who need it and get more RSPS out there! [/center]
[b]Difficulty:[/b] 5
[b]Length:[/b] 10-60 Mins
[b]What you need:[/b] Common Sense
[b]TABLE OF CONTENTS[/b]
[b]1[/b] Downloads
[b]2[/b] Class & Classpath
[b]3[/b] Downloads (2)
[b]4[/b] No-IP
[b]5[/b] Port Forwarding
[b]6[/b] Getting Your Server Online
[size=14pt][b]3 - DOWNLOADS[/b][/size]
Alright the first step to getting your own private server all over the inter-webz is [b]JAVA.[/b] Why? Well you see runescape, as well as the servers, are coded in a computer language called java. You can download java [url=http://java.com/en/download/chrome.jsp?locale=en]HERE![/url] you will also need JDK which you can get [url=http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/jdk-6u26-download-400750.html]HERE![/url] [i]ABOUT JDK[/i] - Well when you click the JDK link the first thing you may notice is a list of different download links read through the list finding an appropriate link, the appropriate link for me would be the very last one. "Windows x64" Meaning JDK for Windows 64 Bit. I will go ahead and post a few links for windows users: [url=http://windows.microsoft.com/en-US/windows7/32-bit-and-64-bit-Windows-frequently-asked-questions]CLICK HERE[/url] TO FIND OUT IF YOUR 32 OR 64 BIT ON W7 FOR XP/VISTA [url=http://lmgtfy.com/?q=how+to+tell+if+your+32+or+64+bit+windows+vista+and+xp]CLICK HERE![/url] [url=http://download.oracle.com/otn-pub/java/jdk/6u26-b03/jdk-6u26-windows-i586.exe]Windows 32 Bit[/url] [url=http://download.oracle.com/otn-pub/java/jdk/6u26-b03/jdk-6u26-windows-x64.exe]Windows 64 Bit[/url] Note: Incase your wondering what JDK 6u26 or JDK 6u24 is basically is just means the update of JDK for example... [code]JDK 6u26 means Java Developer Kit Build 6 Update 26[/code] Alright now the most important thing to download for a runescape private server! (RSPS) [b]THE SOURCE![/b] Alright if you dont know what a source is then GTFO. I've provided a link to a list of local sources here on Moparscape: [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,488887.0.html]HERES[/url] the thread for sources here on moparscape. Note: To download a source you will need [b]WINRAR[/b] which you can download [url=http://www.win-rar.com/index.php?id=predownload&dl=/rar/wrar401.exe]HERE![/url]
[b]PICTURE[/b] [img]http://i1132.photobucket.com/albums/m575/BlahBerrys/Untitled-1-2.jpg[/img]
[b][i][u]Check list[/u][/i][/b]
[b] Java [/b] [img]http://imwebhosting.com/img/icon_checkmark.gif[/img] [b] JDK [/b] [img]http://imwebhosting.com/img/icon_checkmark.gif[/img] [b] Source [/b] [img]http://imwebhosting.com/img/icon_checkmark.gif[/img]
[size=14pt][b]2 - CLASS & CLASSPATH[/b][/size]
Congratulations you've made it through chapter 1! This means your one your way to becoming an owner to a newly found runescape private server! w00t! Okay so what is a CLASS and a CLASSPATH you might be asking yourself, well its basically just a path for java, so dumbed down it means it tell java where to go! Yay! You smart nao! Alright yo lets get started so there are two ways to do this! The automatic way and the manual way. Okay so I recently saw a program, a fellow Moparscape user named [b]EVIL_[/b] created.
[b]AUTOMATIC WAY[/b] This program automatically sets your CLASS and CLASSPATH like all other programs its not 100% guaranteed to work and will [b]NOT[/b] work for everyone! To read up more about this program you can click [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,471074.0.html]HERE[/url] to go to the orginal thread for this program, otherwise click [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?855q6rhbp055s4n]HERE[/url] to download the program! NOTE: You need .NET 2.0 or higher to use this program which can download [url=http://www.microsoft.com/download/en/details.aspx?displaylang=en&id=19]HERE[/url]
[b]MANUAL WAY (RECOMMENDED)[/b] I personally recommend this way because it works 100% no matter what as long as ya do it right ;) Alright so the first step is to find your java/jdk folder mine is.. [code]C:\Program Files (x86)\Java[/code] Okay so keep this open and Navigate to your system.. You can do this by one of two ways, One click the [b]START[/b] button and then right click on [b][i]COMPUTER[/i][/b] and [b][i]PROPERTIES[/i][/b] And the second way is to copy this.. [code]Control Panel\System and Security\System[/code] and then go to you [b][i]DOCUMENTS[/i][/b] or [b][i]COMPUTER[/i][/b] and then paste it into the navigation bar at the top of the folder! Keep in mind this is for Vista/7 for XP click [url=http://lmgtfy.com/?q=how+to+get+to+environmental+variables+windows+xp]HERE[/url] Okay so now look for something call [b][i]ADVANCED SYSTEM SETTINGS[/i][/b] and then click it! You should now be at your advanced system settings, and if your on XP and clicked the link above you should already be here! Now find a button called [b][i] ENVIRONMENTAL VARIABLES[/i][/b] and click it. Now you should see two boxes with a few buttons under each. Click new under the top box and then a new box will appear with two text box. On the top text box type... [code]PATJ[/code] Caps are needed. Then on the bottom text box you need to put your link to your JDK Bin. For example mine is... [code]C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_24\bin[/code] Alright now thats done we need to repeat this step only for the bottom box and instead of PATH type [code]CLASSPATH[/code] and instead of a link to your JDK bin you need a link to your java folder inside of your jdk folder. For example mine is... [code]C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_24\jre\bin[/code] Hit okay and then your done, CLASS and CLASSPATH set ;)
[b]Picture[/b] [img]http://i1132.photobucket.com/albums/m575/BlahBerrys/Untitled-1-1.jpg[/img]
[b][i][u]Check list[/u][/i][/b]
[b] PATH [/b] [img]http://imwebhosting.com/img/icon_checkmark.gif[/img] [b] CLASSPATH [/b] [img]http://imwebhosting.com/img/icon_checkmark.gif[/img]
[size=14pt][b]3 - DOWNLOADS (2)[/b][/size]
Thought ya were done downloading did ya? Well.. [size=18pt]GOTCHA![/size] Hehe :D Okay only two things to download now. No-Ip and uTorrent. Why uTorrent you ask? Well wait I'll explain later! I'll just keep this short and sweet download No-Ip [url=https://www.no-ip.com/downloads.php]HERE[/url] and you can download uTorrent [url=http://www.utorrent.com/]HERE[/url] Easy enough?
[b][i][u]Check list[/u][/i][/b]
[b] No-IP [/b] [img]http://imwebhosting.com/img/icon_checkmark.gif[/img] [b] uTorrent [/b] [img]http://imwebhosting.com/img/icon_checkmark.gif[/img]
[size=14pt][b]4 - NO-IP[/b][/size]
Okay so go [url=http://no-ip.com]HERE[/url] register an account and then go to [b][i]ADD A HOST[/i][/b] which should be under [b]YOUR NO-IP[/b] on the toolbar. Once there type in the desired name for your RSPS under [b][i]HOSTNAME:[/i][/b] after that type in what kind of extension you want. EX; no-ip.biz, no-ip.org; zapto.org, hopto.me, etc. The No-ip. biz/org/info are the most popular. After you've done this dont mess with any other settings and just click [b]CREATE HOST.[/b] Okay so you should Have No-Ip downloaded. Now this programs a bit weird and doesn't install any short cuts however just navigate to the folder it installed to, mine is... [code]C:\Program Files (x86)\No-IP[/code] Just go there and double click [b]DUC30[/b] That should start up No-Ip, a box will appear just enter in your email and password you registered your No-Ip account with. After you do that a box or two will appear just look for the one that says your host on it. So mine would be REPisAWSOME.no-ip.biz There should be a check box next to it, just make sure its checked then hit [b]SAVE[/b] Then that box will disappear and a smaller box will be there and there should be 3 green check marks. If so then hit the X and No-Ip will minimize to your tray. If the box with your host didn't come up then hit the [b]SELECT HOST[/b] button and it should.
Picture [IMG]http://i1132.photobucket.com/albums/m575/BlahBerrys/Untitled-1-4.jpg[/img]
[b][i][u]Check list[/u][/i][/b]
[b] Add a Host [/b] [img]http://imwebhosting.com/img/icon_checkmark.gif[/img]
[size=14pt][b]5 - Port FORWARDING[/b][/size]
Yay! w00t w00t! Almost done! :D Remember how you downloaded uTorrent? Well this is where it comes into use! :D Yupp I give you [b]THE EASIEST WAY TO PORT FORWARDING![/b] z0mg nozz! YES! Okay go ahead and open up uTorrent. On the toolbar click on [b]OPTIONS[/b] and then [b] PREFERENCES[/b] a box should pop up. There should be a column on the left click the one that says [b]CONNECTION[/b] and then enter these settings... [code]Enable UPnp port mapping Enable NAT-PMP port mapping Add Windows Firewall exception Port used for incoming connections: 43594[/code] Hit okay and then hit the X on uTorrent and just like No-Ip it should minimize to the tray!
Picture [IMG]http://img54.imageshack.us/img54/9636/12551064my6.png[/img]
[b][i][u]Check list[/u][/i][/b]
[b] Port Forwarding [/b] [img]http://imwebhosting.com/img/icon_checkmark.gif[/img]
[size=14pt][b]6 - GETTING YOUR SERVER ONLINE[/b][/size]
Yessir! The final step until you can brag to everyone that you've got a FREAKING RSPS! w00t baby! Alright so you know that source you downloaded? Well go ahead and drag/extract it to your desktop. Once thats done go into your source folder and find a run.bat right click on the run.bat (also might be called runserver.bat) and hit [b]EDIT[/b] and it should open with Notepad. Now look at the code if its something like this... [code]@echo off title EscapeOfRunes java -Xmx512m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause[/code] It should rune fine, now if its something like so... [code]@echo off title REPisAWSOME is now Online! "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_24\bin" -Xmx512m pause[/code] Then all you have to do is change two things (maybe) now the first is make sure its the right program files. It might be... [code]\Program Files (x86)\[/code] or [code]\Program Files\[/code] just make sure its the appropriate one for you. Secondly look at the [code]\jdk1.6.0_24\[/code] makes sure it says which version of JDK you have. After that save it. Next do the same thing to the Compile.bat and save it. Now rune the compiler and then the Run.bat Note: Its important not to change the code in the run.bat because every source has a different one. Now if you did everything right it should be working, if not people usually screw up at CLASS and CLASSPATH. If you did the automatic CLASS and CLASSPATH then see back to Chapter 2 and try the manual way. Now if everything working fine try to log into your server using moparscapes webclient or if you downloaded a client with your source! Now if you did everything right then...
[b][i][u]Check list[/u][/i][/b]
[b] Make a RSPS [/b] [img]http://imwebhosting.com/img/icon_checkmark.gif[/img]
Picture [IMG]http://i1132.photobucket.com/albums/m575/BlahBerrys/Untitled-1-5.jpg[/img]
Cha-CHING YOU NOW HAVE YOUR OWN RSPS! [IMG]http://achievements.schrankmonster.de/Achievement.aspx?text=Create%20your%20own%20RSPS![/img]
[b]AWSOME SAUCE! Okay so now the credits:[/b] [b]80%[/b] Me - Creating This TuT [b]10%[/b] xxv0iderxx - Port Forward Method [b]10%[/b] Evil_ - Auto Class/Classpath [b]5%[/b] Davidi2 - Source List Yupp... 105% Impressed? You should be. If you feel I owe your credits please message me.
[IMG]http://i1132.photobucket.com/albums/m575/BlahBerrys/90811910_4bd1985f37.jpg[/img]
[size=24pt]PLEASE REPORT ANY BROKEN LINKS TO ME! ALSO ++REP IS APPRECIATED BUT NOT NECESSARY![/size] Please leave feedback! <3

item.title: How to make a RSPS for Dummies
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

We have a topic explaining how to install Java, how to start a RSPS, how to use uTorrent, and how to port forward. We really don’t need anymore alternatives.

I can tell you worked hard on this, but its really unneeded, sorry.

Read full topic

@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“usman555, post:13, topic:402953”][quote author=imsuperman05 link=topic=500015.msg3657669#msg3657669 date=1310142869]

[quote author=usman555 link=topic=500015.msg3657668#msg3657668 date=1310142675]
You people are bitches. I can tell this dude tried hard to make this, and all I can say is that this is way more detailed than the stickied topic of how to start a server. Good job,

because there are alot of tutorials… try to search for stuff when you wanna make a tutorial, because most of the tutorials have been done more then once.
[/quote]When I was making a webclient for my server, I used around 14 sources to get it done. The first one did explain everything, however, it did not suit my server and so I messed around with the codes I could understand and keep them. The rest did more, like this server could to other people. I want to see you portforward from the stickied topic, only the stickied topic. Obviously you wouldn’t be able to.

Obvsiously i was able to because that’s how i portforwarded from that topic.
[/quote]Wow, you are amazing. Do you think you can impress me like that? There are over 50 of each problem that people encounter in the Server Help section. The same problem. Do you think they would use Google or the search bar to fix the problem? Well obviously not, because they would rather just ask for help directly. We need to get more sources so people stop asking the same question. You can go to server help and see that there are like 5 PI problems every page.[/quote]

what the f*ck are you talking about…

item.title: How to make a RSPS for Dummies
item.dc:creator: @eballer48 eballer48
item.description:
@eballer48 wrote:

[center]Hello everyone,
Eballer48 to answer the age old question that every nub out there wants to know.
HOW DO I MAKE A RUNESCAPE PRIVATE SERVER!? Well thats an easy question…
There are several tuts out there all over the internet and most of them are complicated
and out dated, my goal here is to help those who need it and get more RSPS out there! [/center]

Difficulty: 5

Length: 10-60 Mins

What you need: Common Sense

TABLE OF CONTENTS

1 Downloads

2 Class & Classpath

3 Downloads (2)

4 No-IP

5 Port Forwarding

6 Getting Your Server Online

[size=14pt]3 - DOWNLOADS[/size]

Alright the first step to getting your own private server all over the inter-webz is JAVA.
Why? Well you see runescape, as well as the servers, are coded in a computer language called
java. You can download java HERE! you will also need JDK which you can get HERE!
ABOUT JDK - Well when you click the JDK link the first thing you may notice is a list of different download links
read through the list finding an appropriate link, the appropriate link for me would be the very last one.
“Windows x64” Meaning JDK for Windows 64 Bit. I will go ahead and post a few links for windows users:
CLICK HERE TO FIND OUT IF YOUR 32 OR 64 BIT ON W7 FOR XP/VISTA CLICK HERE!
Windows 32 Bit
Windows 64 Bit
Note: Incase your wondering what JDK 6u26 or JDK 6u24 is basically is just means the update of JDK for example…

JDK 6u26 means Java Developer Kit Build 6 Update 26

Alright now the most important thing to download for a runescape private server! (RSPS) THE SOURCE!
Alright if you dont know what a source is then GTFO. I’ve provided a link to a list of local sources here on Moparscape:
HERES the thread for sources here on moparscape.
Note: To download a source you will need WINRAR which you can download HERE!

PICTURE

Untitled-1-2.jpg1024×640

Check list

Java
JDK
Source

[size=14pt]2 - CLASS & CLASSPATH[/size]

Congratulations you’ve made it through chapter 1! This means your one your way to becoming an owner
to a newly found runescape private server! w00t! Okay so what is a CLASS and a CLASSPATH you might
be asking yourself, well its basically just a path for java, so dumbed down it means it tell java where to
go! Yay! You smart nao! Alright yo lets get started so there are two ways to do this! The automatic way
and the manual way. Okay so I recently saw a program, a fellow Moparscape user named EVIL_ created.

AUTOMATIC WAY
This program automatically sets your CLASS and CLASSPATH like all other programs its not 100% guaranteed
to work and will NOT work for everyone! To read up more about this program you can click HERE to go to
the orginal thread for this program, otherwise click HERE to download the program! NOTE: You need .NET 2.0
or higher to use this program which can download HERE

MANUAL WAY (RECOMMENDED)
I personally recommend this way because it works 100% no matter what as long as ya do it right
Alright so the first step is to find your java/jdk folder mine is…

C:\Program Files (x86)\Java

Okay so keep this open and Navigate to your system…
You can do this by one of two ways, One click the START button and then right click on COMPUTER and PROPERTIES
And the second way is to copy this…

Control Panel\System and Security\System

and then go to you DOCUMENTS or COMPUTER and then paste it into the navigation bar at the top of the folder!
Keep in mind this is for Vista/7 for XP click HERE
Okay so now look for something call ADVANCED SYSTEM SETTINGS and then click it! You should now be at your
advanced system settings, and if your on XP and clicked the link above you should already be here! Now find a button called
ENVIRONMENTAL VARIABLES and click it. Now you should see two boxes with a few buttons under each. Click new
under the top box and then a new box will appear with two text box. On the top text box type…

PATJ

Caps are needed. Then on the bottom text box you need to put your link to your JDK Bin. For example mine is…

C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_24\bin

Alright now thats done we need to repeat this step only for the bottom box and instead of PATH type

CLASSPATH

and instead of a link to your JDK bin you need a link to your java folder inside of your jdk folder. For example mine is…

C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_24\jre\bin

Hit okay and then your done, CLASS and CLASSPATH set

Picture

Untitled-1-1.jpg1024×640

Check list

PATH
CLASSPATH

[size=14pt]3 - DOWNLOADS (2)[/size]

Thought ya were done downloading did ya? Well… [size=18pt]GOTCHA![/size] Hehe
Okay only two things to download now. No-Ip and uTorrent. Why uTorrent you ask? Well wait I’ll explain later!
I’ll just keep this short and sweet download No-Ip HERE
and you can download uTorrent HERE Easy enough?

Check list

No-IP
uTorrent

[size=14pt]4 - NO-IP[/size]

Okay so go HERE register an account and then go to ADD A HOST which should be under YOUR NO-IP on the toolbar. Once there type in the desired name for your RSPS under HOSTNAME:
after that type in what kind of extension you want. EX; no-ip.biz, no-ip.org; zapto.org, hopto.me, etc. The No-ip. biz/org/info are the most popular.
After you’ve done this dont mess with any other settings and just click CREATE HOST. Okay so you should Have No-Ip downloaded.
Now this programs a bit weird and doesn’t install any short cuts however just navigate to the folder it installed to, mine is…

C:\Program Files (x86)\No-IP

Just go there and double click DUC30
That should start up No-Ip, a box will appear just enter in your email and password you registered your No-Ip account with.
After you do that a box or two will appear just look for the one that says your host on it. So mine would be REPisAWSOME.no-ip.biz
There should be a check box next to it, just make sure its checked then hit SAVE Then that box will disappear and a smaller
box will be there and there should be 3 green check marks. If so then hit the X and No-Ip will minimize to your tray. If the box with
your host didn’t come up then hit the SELECT HOST button and it should.

Picture

Untitled-1-4.jpg1024×640

Check list

Add a Host

[size=14pt]5 - Port FORWARDING[/size]

Yay! w00t w00t! Almost done! Remember how you downloaded uTorrent? Well this is where it comes into use!
Yupp I give you THE EASIEST WAY TO PORT FORWARDING! z0mg nozz!
YES! Okay go ahead and open up uTorrent. On the toolbar click on OPTIONS and then PREFERENCES a box should
pop up. There should be a column on the left click the one that says CONNECTION and then enter these settings…

Enable UPnp port mapping Enable NAT-PMP port mapping Add Windows Firewall exception Port used for incoming connections: 43594
Hit okay and then hit the X on uTorrent and just like No-Ip it should minimize to the tray!

Picture

Check list

Port Forwarding

[size=14pt]6 - GETTING YOUR SERVER ONLINE[/size]

Yessir! The final step until you can brag to everyone that you’ve got a FREAKING RSPS! w00t baby! Alright so you know that source
you downloaded? Well go ahead and drag/extract it to your desktop. Once thats done go into your source folder and find a run.bat
right click on the run.bat (also might be called runserver.bat) and hit EDIT and it should open with Notepad. Now look at the code if its something like this…

@echo off title EscapeOfRunes java -Xmx512m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause
It should rune fine, now if its something like so…

@echo off title REPisAWSOME is now Online! "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_24\bin" -Xmx512m pause
Then all you have to do is change two things (maybe) now the first is make sure its the right program files. It might be…

\Program Files (x86)\ or \Program Files\ just make sure its the appropriate one for you.
Secondly look at the \jdk1.6.0_24\ makes sure it says which version of JDK you have. After that save it.
Next do the same thing to the Compile.bat and save it. Now rune the compiler and then the Run.bat
Note: Its important not to change the code in the run.bat because every source has a different one.
Now if you did everything right it should be working, if not people usually screw up at CLASS and CLASSPATH. If you did the automatic
CLASS and CLASSPATH then see back to Chapter 2 and try the manual way. Now if everything working fine try to log into your server
using moparscapes webclient or if you downloaded a client with your source! Now if you did everything right then…

Check list

Make a RSPS

Picture

Untitled-1-5.jpg1024×640

Cha-CHING YOU NOW HAVE YOUR OWN RSPS!

AWSOME SAUCE! Okay so now the credits:
80% Me - Creating This TuT
10% xxv0iderxx - Port Forward Method
10% Evil_ - Auto Class/Classpath
5% Davidi2 - Source List
Yupp… 105% Impressed? You should be.
If you feel I owe your credits please message me.

[size=24pt]PLEASE REPORT ANY BROKEN LINKS TO ME! ALSO ++REP IS APPRECIATED BUT NOT NECESSARY![/size]
Please leave feedback! <3

item.source: How to make a RSPS for Dummies
